title: Millets of Mewar
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Pizza, Indian, International, Organic, Western
description: Menu offers soups, breads, salads, curries, pizza, snacks, and sweets (including vegan pancakes and millet cookies); has gluten free. Floor cushion seating on the middle floor, instruments available to play, local art for sale on the walls, and a literature section with books and magazines to browse (subjects such as human rights, community, environment, sustainability, permaculture).
streetAddress: Pichhola Lake, near Hanuman Ghat Hotel
